howto.name: How to Use White Noise Machine - DRMN for Better Sleep
howto.description: Learn how to use White Noise Machine - DRMN app to fall asleep faster and sleep better. Step-by-step guide to using white noise and nature sounds for sleep.

step.name: Download and Install DRMN
step.text: Download White Noise Machine - DRMN from the App Store on your iPhone. The app requires iOS 17.1 or later and is completely free to download.

step.name: Open the App and Browse Sounds
step.text: Launch DRMN and explore the comprehensive sound library. You'll find white noise, brown noise, nature sounds (rain, ocean waves, fire), meditation sounds, and baby sleep sounds.

step.name: Select Your Preferred Sound
step.text: Choose a sound that matches your needs - white noise for masking disruptive sounds, nature sounds for relaxation, or baby sleep sounds for infants. Tap on any sound to preview it.

step.name: Mix Multiple Sounds (Optional)
step.text: For a custom audio experience, you can mix multiple sounds together. Combine white noise with ocean waves, or rain with meditation sounds to create your perfect sleep environment.

step.name: Set Sleep Timer and Fade-Out
step.text: Configure the sleep timer with automatic fade-out if you don't want sounds playing all night. This feature helps you fall asleep and then gradually fades the sound out.

step.name: Start Playback and Relax
step.text: Press play to start your selected sound. Adjust the volume to a comfortable level that masks disruptive noises without being too loud. Place your phone nearby or use headphones for the best experience.

step.name: Download Sounds for Offline Use
step.text: Download your favorite sounds to use DRMN offline. Once downloaded, you can enjoy uninterrupted sleep anywhere, even without an internet connection.
